chapters.title: Chapter 15: Gathering Darkness
chapters.info: Falion Bhoda, p. 377 (452)—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the White. She fled the Tower as a novice to Ebou Dar before being discovered and brought back. She is now in service to Shiaine, as a maid. She is feigning a relationship with Daved Hanlon so that the two could exchange information without arousing suspicions.
